<MethodEndpoint

Creates a mail contact with the parameters specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"description":"Contact name","type":"string"},"description":{"description":"Contact description","type":"string"},"emails":{"description":"List of contact emails","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"phoneNumbers":{"description":"List of contact phone numbers","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Information about created contact","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ContactId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Name":{"type":"string","example":"name"},"Description":{"type":"string","example":"description"},"Emails":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Value":{"type":"string","example":"value"},"IsPrimary":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ContactInfo"}},"PhoneNumbers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Value":{"type":"string","example":"value"},"IsPrimary":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ContactInfo"}},"Type":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"SmallFotoUrl":{"type":"string","example":"smallFotoUrl"},"MediumFotoUrl":{"type":"string","example":"mediumFotoUrl"}},"title":"MailContactData"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
